Title: "World of WoWo" Silverlight Game,MMORPG
Description: World of WoWo is a browser game of MMORPG using Silverlight solution. The game style is based on story line of Wow. Use easy and funny way to guide users getting happiness. This project is made by iChinaGames Co. The HQ is located in Beijing of China.
